channel.item:
Jolly Rancher Cool Tubes Review http://localhost:1313/posts/jolly-rancher-cool-tubes-review/ Tue, 11 Feb 2014 21:37:00 +0000 (Toby Marks) http://localhost:1313/posts/jolly-rancher-cool-tubes-review/

Back in the summer of 2013 TheVCubeSolver and I dropped by the local candy shop to review Blue Bunny’s Jolly Rancher Cool Tubes, a push-pop like product in three weird flavors. It turned out to be a complete and total sensory experience.
